publicationStmt.publisher: To the Reader: The English Preface in Print, c. 1475-1640 / Early English Books Online Text Creation Partnership

monogr.title: The summe and substance of the conference : which, it pleased his excellent Maiestie to haue with the lords, bishops, and other of his clergie, (at vvhich the most of the lordes of the councell were present) in his Maiesties priuy-chamber, at Hampton Court. Ianuary 14. 1603. Contracted by VVilliam Barlovv, Doctor of Diuinity, and Deane of Chester. Whereunto are added, some copies, (scattered abroad,) vnsauory, and vntrue
monogr.author: Barlow, William

div.head: The Preface.
div.p: MAny Copies were sent me, wherof some were so shamelesly vntrue, and I assure you, so obscaene, that I think his Maiestie would haue bene as much offended with me for Printing, as with the Authors for dispearsing them: I haue chosen three of the best, and cleanliest, which doe here▪ vnder follow.
I giue no censure, neither know I the Dispearsers, let the Reader conferre and iudge. Rectum est iudex sui, & obliqui.
